writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel out, int flags)

ClassDesc: A RemoteInput object collects a response from users and sets the response as an intent extra inside the @B_android#app#PendingIntent_E@ that is sent. Always use @B_android#preview#support#wearable#notifications#RemoteInput#Builder_E@ to create instances of this class. See The following example adds a RemoteInput to a @B_android#preview#support#wearable#notifications#WearableNotifications#Action_E@, sets the intent extra key as quick_reply, and sets the label as Quick Reply. Users are prompted to input a response when they trigger the action. The results are sent as an intent extra with the key of @B_android#preview#support#wearable#notifications#RemoteInput#returnKey_E@ in the action's @B_android#app#PendingIntent_E@.
